author: snoopdave
msg: Provide a blog entry-level description field that can go into HTML header field
Plus some changes to remove Servlet 2.4 dependency that was causing problems with mvn jetty:run

author: veithen
msg: * Attempt to increase the probability of observing the issue described in AXIS-2498 in MultithreadTestCase.
* Ensure that MultithreadTestCase will report hanging threads (instead of blocking the build).
